name: Ready Cube
description:
This game took 3 years to make. A lot of effort was put into making this game. (but still there are some bugs) the game will be constantly improved, bugs fixed and made better. Click here to watch previews of this game. To help with the production of this game, Be sure to join our Discord.

Some information about the game

This game is very easy but there are also hard levels. The aim of the game is to reach the end without touching the obstacles by pressing the right and left buttons. Each level has different obstacles and different music. Each level of this game has different awesome music. Level editor will be added to the game in the next updates. so don't forget to follow. There are 16 levels in the first version of this game. 8 of them are easy, 5 of them are bonus (normal), 3 of them are hard levels. All the levels are different and wonderful from each other. In the 1.0 version of this game, 90% of the bugs in the game have been fixed. The game is now fully playable.

How to play:

You can move the ball right and left with the right and left arrow keys on the screen. The ball is already going forward on its own. You have to pass without touching any of the obstacles in front of you. the little yellow circles are coins. If you touch them, you will earn 1 coin. little brown cubes are points and if you touch them your score will increase by 1. It appears as highscore on the level screen. If you pass the level, you will win 1 key and the level will turn green. Some levels are locked. These require coins, keys or gems to unlock them. If you have enough of them, the lock will be unlocked automatically. You cannot win the gem. but you can buy from the shop for a fee

New features that come with version 1.0 of this game:
  • bug fixes about some obstacles
  • menu edits
  • top secret code writing place with no secrets
  • the game's self-reset bug has been fixed
New features that come with version 1.1 of this game:
  • the menu has been completely renewed
  • Added defeat effect and sound
  • Added defeat screen
  • Added new level
  • flying ball bug fixed
  • game logo changed
  • game icon changed
New features that come with version 1.2 of this game:
  • New 3 levels
  • Ball select system (New 4 balls, colored ball, snowball, fireball, trex)
  • Some bug fixs
  • New menu
  • Test mode
New features that come with version 1.2.1 of this game:
  • Some bug fixs
  • New sound effects
